tool_description: Get detailed information about countries, cities, administrative regions and  search for the cities near by.
name: World Geo Data
title: World Geo Data

api_list.name: Cities in the Country
api_list.description: Returns the list of the cities in the country

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of results per page is 100

api_list.name: Cities in the Administrative Division
api_list.description: Returns the list of cities in the administrative division

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of results per page is 100

api_list.name: Cities near Location
api_list.description: Returns the cities in the specified radius from the geo location

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of results per page is 100

api_list.name: City Details
api_list.description: Returns a detailed information about the city and it's location

api_list.name: Country Details
api_list.description: Information about the country: area_size, country, continent, timezone, currency, population, flag, dependent territories, wikipedia reference totals of the cities and the first-level divisions

api_list.name: Country Administrative Divisions
api_list.description: Returns the list of administrative divisions of the country

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of results per page is 100

api_list.name: Country ISO Divisions
api_list.description: Returns the list of divisions based on the ISO Standard

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of results per page is 100

api_list.name: Country ISO Sub-Divisions
api_list.description: Returns the list of sub divisions in the specific division based on the ISO Standard

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of results per page is 100

api_list.name: Country Administrative Division Details
api_list.description: Returns the detailed information about administrative division

api_list.name: Country ISO Division Details
api_list.description: Returns the detailed information about  ISO division

api_list.name: Country Administrative Sub-Divisions
api_list.description: Returns the list of administrative sub divisions  of the country based on the geonameid

api_list.name: Countries and Dependent Territories
api_list.description: Returns a list of countries and territories if requested

api_list.name: Country GeoJson
api_list.description: Returns the multi-polygon of the country
